X.ii.6.E.1.b
.
Minor Beneficiaries With Multiple Custodial Parents
If it appears more than one natural or adoptive parent is the custodian of a minor, refer this information to the hub of jurisdiction.  The hub will advise which parent to pay.
If a current
VA Form 21P-555
is not of record, request it by preparing
VA Form 21-592
and submitting it to the hub of jurisdiction.
Note
:  For the purpose of this section, a minor is an individual that has not yet reached the age of majority as set forth in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, 6.E.3.c
.
